Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Southport due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Southport due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
